body.name: My Sweet Baby Disappearing Magic Bottles - Includes 1 Milk, 1 Juice Bottle with Pacifier for Baby Doll (Colorful)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 25 mins
features: These lightweight plastic bottles appear to empty when the baby doll drinks, sparking the imagination and providing hours of enjoyment.
The fluid level in each bottle decreases more quickly the farther its tilted.
Each bottle is decorated with cute wraparound graphics to entertain young minds.
This set includes one (1) 6" baby milk bottle and one (1) baby juice bottle with handle for easy grip to hold the Bottle.and 1 Pacifier
Challenge your children's imaginations and keep them active,Recommended for ages 3 years and up.and made of top quality with all safety tested.
body.description: Magical Bottles for Your Lovely Doll These Magic Doll Bottles from Exquisite Buggy are specially made for hungry baby dolls. While feeding with this magic bottles the liquid inside it disappears magically. You’ll get a set of two magic bottles, one is milk and another one is an orange juice bottle. While playing with these magic bottles it seems like the doll is really drinking which will make your child amazed. The magic doll bottles have cute animated graphics on it Bottles are made of plastic and lightweight Best gift for your cute baby dolls

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Realistic Design The realistic design of the magic bottles makes it more amazing. Your kids will be amazed after seeing milk and orange juice disappearing from the bottles as if the baby doll actually drinks it. Both the bottles have cute baby animated graphics on it. The more you tilt the bottles the more quickly fluid level will decrease. Magical Bottles for Your Lovely Doll These Magic Doll Bottles from Exquisite Buggy are specially made for hungry baby dolls. While feeding with this magic bottles the liquid inside it disappears magically. You’ll get a set of two magic bottles, one is milk and another one is an orange juice bottle. While playing with these magic bottles it seems like the doll is really drinking which will make your child amazed. The magic doll bottles have cute animated graphics on it Bottles are made of plastic and lightweight Best gift for your cute baby dolls

Feed Cute Baby Dolls with Magic Doll Bottles Keep your kids busy with these magic feeding bottles and challenge their imagination. Whenever your baby doll is hungry feed them with these magic bottles and sees the bottles appearing empty magically.

Magic Milk and Juice Bottle More than Play While playing with these magic doll bottles your children’s also learn about practical life. The plastic bottles are lightweight so your kids can easily play with the toys and feed their hungry baby dolls. Every time your child plays with these magical bottles it sparks their imagination which ultimately helps them to learn more about new things. How to Feed with Magic Bottles These magic doll bottles from Exquisite Buggy comes with a liquid in it. The milk bottle has white and the orange juice bottle has orange liquid which looks like a real drink. Your kids just need to put the bottle into their dolls mouth and the bottle will start getting empty. The farther bottles will be tilted the fluid level will decrease more. Safe and Easy Packaging The milk and orange juice magic bottles come in a single packet with a pacifier for baby dolls. The packet design has a colourful illustration and it can be easily opened without using any tool. Your child won’t need any help to open the packet and start playing. Make your kids birthday more special with this magical bottles specially designed for 3+ years children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my little niece to go with a doll I got her for Christmas and she seemed to love feeding her doll with them 💚 My son even was feeding her doll with one. So I'd say, he approves as well. I had some like these when I was younger and I loved them. They were always so magical because when you're young, you just cannot understand where all the liquid in such a full bottle goes 😂💚 If I or anyone else gets my son a baby doll, I will be purchasing again, for sure. These ones are so cute with the pictures on them rather than just being plain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money good packaging
reviews.reviewText: The packing of these had me worried. Then they came in a very small box. When I opened the box the bows were stacked perfectly. I only had one bent loop. Very impressive. Thank you for whoever took the time to package these. Wonderful colors. I will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby doll needs a bottle
reviews.reviewText: Quite impressed we were when we saw how it ĺooked like the doll was drinking the milk and juice. This is a great "add on gift".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I remember these when I was a girl. I got my grandaughter a baby doll and purchased these separately. There were mixed reviews, but this seemed to be the best option. They are okay, but not was what I was expecting. When you turn the bottles over, the liquid disappears very quickly, not a little at a time like I remembered. My grandaughter likes them though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024

reviews.reviewerName: Entregado antes de lo establecido…súper feliz con mi compra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy granddaughter.
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter really enjoyed the bottles, especially the noises it makes. Very satisfied. highly recommended to buy.
Gave it to a 1 year old granddaughter. Loves it.
La verdad están muy pequeñas para el costo que manejan, a parte no tienen nada de mágicas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 1yr old niece who has began playing with her dolls she was so happy with these and called them milky. She lost one the same day and had a meltdown until we found it and her uncle went racing up to give her milky back and having saved the day and eardrums she went on her merry way feeding her baby.
Got this for my 7year old sister for Christmas. It came on time, and she loves them.I don't think the pacifier fit any of her dolls, but I only ordered this for the bottles so that wasn't a problem.
